PATIENT_ID: TEST_PERIPH_VASC_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-03 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-03 08:10:00
Category II activation for 60-year-old female with isolated head laceration
after ground-level fall at home. No loss of consciousness.
BP 144/88, HR 68, RR 14, GCS 15.
Scalp laceration repaired with staples. No other injuries.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-03 08:30:00
CT head without contrast: no intracranial abnormality.
No cervical spine abnormality.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-03 08:50:00
Isolated scalp laceration. No other traumatic findings.
Discharged with wound care instructions and follow-up.
